Package com.intellij.formatting.alignment

Class AlignmentStrategy.AlignmentPerTypeStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.formatting.alignment.AlignmentStrategy
      • com.intellij.formatting.alignment.AlignmentStrategy.AlignmentPerTypeStrategy
  • Enclosing class:
    AlignmentStrategy

    public static class AlignmentStrategy.AlignmentPerTypeStrategy
extends AlignmentStrategy
    Alignment strategy that creates and caches alignments for target element types and returns them for elements with the same types.
